column2: Rockstar Games Release GTA V on the Wii U.
column5: It is simply foolish for Rockstar Games to discriminate against and insult us Wii U enthusiats by witholding the release of GTA V. This next generation console has better gaming performance than the geriatric Xbox 360 and PS3 on which the game is currently restricted to. It's graphics are comparable to Xbox One and PS4,,,Release GTA V on the Wii U."
